title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a chain of hippie themed pizza restaurants, they offer vegan and gluten-free options. The regular white-wheat crust for pizzas/calzones/pretzels is vegan and a gluten free crust is available also. Hoagie bread is not vegan. Offers Daiya vegan cheese, marinated tofu and tempeh toppings/fillings.
